Uses of Package
solver

  • Packages that use solver 
    Package Description
    solver
    Provides the classes to interface with solver libraries such as JAMA.
  • Classes in solver used by solver 
    Class and Description
    Diagonalizer
    Provides a class for matrix diagonalization, E = U'HU The instance is generated through Solver as,
    Diagonalizer solver = Solver.getDiagonalizer(); Then, append the matrix and diagonalize, solver.diag(double[][] H); The eigenvalues and eigenvectors are obtained by, double[] E = solver.getEigenValue(); double[][] U = solver.getVector();
    MatrixOperation
    Provides the classes for matrix operations.
    SVD
    Provides a class for singular value decomposition, A = USV' The instance is generated through Solver as,
    SingularValueDecomposition solver = Solver.getSVD(); Then, append the matrix and carry out SVD, solver.calc(double[][] A) The singular values, U and V matrices are obtained by, double[] s = solver.getS(); double[][] U = solver.getU(); double[][] V = solver.getV(); Note that A = UsV' (V': transpose of V).
